summary: In Switzerland each Canton is free to decide its own internal organisation.
full_text: The Canton of Lucerne  is a canton of Switzerland. It is located in the centre of Switzerland. The population of the canton  is 394,604. As of 2007, the population included 57,268 foreigners, or about 15.8% of the total population. The cantonal capital is Lucerne.
title: Lucerne (canton)
